content: notes about design the colorfall sweater has a top-down construction with a round yoke it has a relaxed fit with a positive ease of about 24 cm around the bust circumference the sweater is worked in the round only on the right side along the yoke section there are several increases according to the needed yoke depth bust and sleeve circumference the yoke is then divided into sleeves and body the 3 parts are then worked individually until completing the desired length work a slip_stitch in the back loop ribbing on the bottom hem neckline and cuffs to finish the sweater measurements and sizes the colorfall sweater pattern is available in 8 sizes from small to 5x large the model is 168 cm tall and wears size medium *neckline width a 22 cm 22 22 22 22 22 24 24 yoke depth b 19 cm 20 20 5 22 23 23 5 24 5 25 5 bust width c 53 cm 56 58 5 62 65 5 70 5 75 5 80 5 sleeve circ d 30 cm 32 34 36 44 46 48 50 sleeve length e 37 cm 36 36 36 35 35 36 36 length f 46 cm 47 47 5 49 51 51 5 53 5 54 5 *the neckline width is measured considering the ribbing without ribbing the neckline circumference will be too wide how much yarn do you need i used marathon 3 5 by katia yarns yarn composition 75% acrylic 25% wool 1 skein has 50 grams and is approximately 125 meters the colors i used 8 camel 46 saffron yellow 9 beige 6 fawn brown 43 reseda green 47 khaki 44 green 37 bottle green in total you will approximately need 850 910 950 1040 1170 1260 1380 1480 meters
